On 1/12/2018 at 5:22 AM, JohnMcLane said:

What does this mean?

This mod works fine in 1.2.2

AND in 1.3.0 and 1.3.1 if you update the dependencies.

I DOOOOOOOOOOO Up date all the dependencies and the wheels won't activate and the nose gear wont close

 

 

 

SAAAAAAAAAAAANNNNNNNNNNNNNNDDDDDDDDDDDDD HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP

Can you please write like normal people?
If you install this and update all dependencies it will work. Don`t use the dependencies delivered with this mod. Download them separately. And: which KSP-Version do you use?

I DOOOOOOOOOOO Up date all the dependencies and the wheels won't activate and the nose gear wont close

 

 

 

SAAAAAAAAAAAANNNNNNNNNNNNNNDDDDDDDDDDDDD HHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAALLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLLPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP

littrally just need ksp.wheel pluggin wich can be found in kerbal foundries and SSTU
I think he @LIPLOOP is confused because he postet in the old thread of MikeNZ`s Shuttle. I think he mistakes this two mods. MikeNZ`s Shuttle do not work in 1.3.1 and the gears are broken.

If you are talking about the Mk2.5 Spaceplane parts by MikeNZ, that was revived by myself a while ago

6 hours ago, KidFudyGX Labs said:

My Shuttle is all black

 

Are you forcing DX11? The shuttle don`t work with DX11.

9 hours ago, Cheesecake said:

The shuttle don`t work with DX11.

Which is sad, because KSP mostly doesn't work with KSP using DX9.  (egads it's painfully slow)
You can use OpenGL
Oooooh!  So I can!  Not meaning to be a berk, but is there an RSS/RO patch for this?  Could that be linked in the OP if so?

6 hours ago, slaintemaith said:

Oooooh!  So I can!  Not meaning to be a berk, but is there an RSS/RO patch for this?  Could that be linked in the OP if so?

watch @hellblazer Video he had one
How are you supposed to get into orbit with this thing, every time I pitch till I am horizontal, my time till apoapsis lowers and I overshoot my apoapsis and everything fails. Could anybody help me?

38 minutes ago, JEB'S DESTINY said:

How are you supposed to get into orbit with this thing, every time I pitch till I am horizontal, my time till apoapsis lowers and I overshoot my apoapsis and everything fails. Could anybody help me?

Sounds like you are pitching too soon and/or too much.

Do a test launch with Gravity Turn and watch what  it does.

Hey

 

I'm getting the all black cockpit and fuselage as well. I'm not forcing DX11 and have all the dependencies.

I did a completely clean install of KSP recently and it was was fine. I then added a few new mods and think one of them may conflict in some way. Does anyone know if the shuttle uses Texture Replacer or Textures Unlimited in any way because the problem seems to occur when i installed the Astronomer's visual pack, which changed the main menu page from saying "Kerbal Space Program - Texture Replacer Replaced" to " Kerbal Space Program - Astronomers Pack"

I also noticed that i have the mod by @bcink of the James Webb telescope and the textures on that have also been messed up. The shiny sun protector and hexagonal panels have also turned black, and that mod uses Textures Unlimited. Figured they must be related.

However, i don't believe uninstalling Astronomer's visual pack has fixed it. I have to do a clean install to erase whatever changed.

Thanks

2 hours ago, windystig said:

Hey

 

I'm getting the all black cockpit and fuselage as well. I'm not forcing DX11 and have all the dependencies.

I did a completely clean install of KSP recently and it was was fine. I then added a few new mods and think one of them may conflict in some way. Does anyone know if the shuttle uses Texture Replacer or Textures Unlimited in any way because the problem seems to occur when i installed the Astronomer's visual pack, which changed the main menu page from saying "Kerbal Space Program - Texture Replacer Replaced" to " Kerbal Space Program - Astronomers Pack"

I also noticed that i have the mod by @bcink of the James Webb telescope and the textures on that have also been messed up. The shiny sun protector and hexagonal panels have also turned black, and that mod uses Textures Unlimited. Figured they must be related.

However, i don't believe uninstalling Astronomer's visual pack has fixed it. I have to do a clean install to erase whatever changed.

Thanks

The Shuttle uses TextureReplacer for the windows and radiators but should work without TR. TRR is not supported. The Shuttle itself will work without TR. It is only for the reflections.

Because there is a conflict between TR/TRR and TU I removed TR/TRR and replaced the TR-configs with a config for TU. On the other side: TU needs DX11 or OpenGL to work. It don`t work well with DX9. So, to use the Shuttle and TU alongside you shoud use OpenGL.

Here is my config for TU.

ShaderShuttle.cfg

1 hour ago, Cheesecake said:

The Shuttle uses TextureReplacer for the windows and radiators but should work without TR. TRR is not supported. The Shuttle itself will work without TR. It is only for the reflections.

Because there is a conflict between TR/TRR and TU I removed TR/TRR and replaced the TR-configs with a config for TU. On the other side: TU needs DX11 or OpenGL to work. It don`t work well with DX9. So, to use the Shuttle and TU alongside you shoud use OpenGL.

Here is my config for TU.

ShaderShuttle.cfg

Hey Cheesecake

Thanks for this. I couldn't actually get the cfg to download. It took me on a very strange journey with a .exe searching for a torrent. Not to worry, i am not too concerned about the reflections.

I will look to remove TR/TRR and go from there. 

Thanks again.

On 27/01/2018 at 4:44 AM, KidFudyGX Labs said:

My Shuttle is all black

 

Hey,

i had this issue but have fixed it. Seemed to be some kind of clash between Texture Replacer, Texture Unlimited and the introduction of the Astronomer's Visual Pack. I had to do a completely clean install and removed Texture Replacer and don't use Astronomer's pack now. Just uninstalling those mods didn't fix it. Needed a totally fresh start.
So, is this mod working with the latest version of KSP and can it be downloaded with CKAN?

1 hour ago, PILOTCRAFTER said:

So, is this mod working with the latest version of KSP and can it be downloaded with CKAN?

As you can see on this page: Yes it works in 1.3.1. And no, it is not on CKAN. You must download and istall it manually.

Edited February 11, 2018 by Cheesecake

Considering a few people are still interested in the RO/RSS configs of the Shuttle. I might as well upload it. Includes a craft file too. I removed the Canadarm and whatnot to untangle the craft from other mods. Naturally this comes from a 1.2.2 build. RO/RSS is not yet compatible with 1.3+

https://ufile.io/x0obk

As for to the question of where to place the folder with config files... Well, you can store them this way, for example:

GameData\RealismOverhaul\RO_SuggestedMods\SPACE_SHUTTLE_SYSTEM
Hi, have installed the space shuttle on ksp system 1.3.1, based on updated, but I can't change the texture of the Shuttle. Writes not found. What to do?
